autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my own accomplishments, forgetting to acknowledge the role of God's providence in guiding me towards success?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in expressing yourself with words that were coarse or unbecoming , thereby violating the dignity of others
with words that were coarse or unbecoming , thereby violating the dignity of others
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in expressing yourself with words that were coarse or unbecoming, thereby violating the dignity of others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to habits that contradict your commitment to temperance
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, potentially leading to habits that contradict your commitment to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an attachment to worldly pleasures that rejects the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

such as community events , parties , or when dining out
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking at social gatherings, such as community events, parties, or when dining out?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I used someone else's private affairs for entertainment or pride, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing or relaying private information about acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing or relaying private information about acquaintances, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: onto feelings of rage against others
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage against others in my relationships, rather than seeking reconciliation?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
